name: Alex Kurtz
text: Usually this location is great, however, today was not their best day. I barely finished eating my slice of pizza before my stomach started to hurt and I had to run to the bathroom. I have to throw basically a whole pizza away and hope that my family doesn‚Äôt get sick as well.

name: Jordan Lopez
text: Make sure you have buffalo sauce at home.. Order boneless wings ( 5/27/20) around 3pm and got chicken nuggets instead. Just shows the lack of effort.. No sauce what so ever.. robbery.

name: Oswaldo Cisneros
text: I ordered a large pizza at 6:01pm and they had informed me it would be I route to my house at 6:35pm. I called the store at 7:01 to cancel my order and the pizza arrived at 7:05pm cold. Which was whack given that I live 5 min away. Once the delivery guy arrived I took the pizza not wanting to be rude and just threw it away.

name: richard wirick
text: We have always had good service at this location. Typically the food is great but...the last two weeks the pizzas have been undercooked. Tonight I've put it in my oven to bake it more. Hope this isn't a trend.

text: Pizza hut is usually hit or miss but this location is awesome. The food is more then what I expected and the staff are super friendly. I will definitely be a regular here

text: My first time to this Pizza Hut location. My experience was awesome! Don‚Äôt pay attention to those bad reviews! The dude that took are order was very cool and chill with the flow of life. He didn‚Äôt show any sign of any boardness or any sign ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Ferguson
text: It was alright. The sauce was a bit to sweet for me.

name: Kelli Huebner
text: Super fast delivery, they knew the gated area we were in before I could rattle it off.  Guy on the phone found me the best deal for the night when I told him what I wanted instead of just taking my order. Delivery guy brought plates and napkins, super friendly and funny. Best pizza hut in the area.

name: Diddlez505
text: The Older Mexican lady that works there is super rude, been here 4 times and every single time she got attitude. The rest of the staff is cool though and food is good when she's not there.

name: Gaby Garza
text: The staff at this pizza hut are really friendly and value good customer service. I had to wait about 15 minutes for my carryout order after I had arrived but the gentleman at the counter was very apologetic. He even offered to pay for my food which I was very impressed by.
